title: Introduction to C Programming
description: C programming: Powerful, efficient language. Foundation for system software, games, and embedded applications. Vital in computer science education.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Algorithms: Step-by-step instructions for problem-solving. Fundamental in computer science, from search engines to sorting data efficiently.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: C++ for DSA: Blend of powerful language (C++) and Data Structures & Algorithms. Essential for efficient problem-solving in programming.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Basic Data Structures: Fundamental containers for organizing and manipulating data, including arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, and trees

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: OOP in Python: Object-oriented paradigm for code organization. Classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism streamline complex program design and development.

title: Software Engineering
description: Software Engineering: Systematic approach to design, develop, and maintain software. Involves planning, coding, testing, and maintenance for robust applications.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: AWS: Amazon Web Services, dominant cloud computing platform. Offers a wide range of scalable services for various applications and industries.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: MySQL: Popular open-source relational database management system. Employs SQL for managing and querying structured data in various applications.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Problem-Solving: Critical skill involving analytical thinking and creativity to find effective solutions in various contexts and disciplines.
